Hello,

I have read severals books about Junit. The books explain well how =
to design a unit testable code and how to use stub and mock BUT I found few=
 explanations about which unit test should we write. 

The only references =
I found were :
1 : in pragramtic unit testing (summary free here http://med=
ia.pragprog.com/titles/utj/StandaloneSummary.pdf )
2 : a essay too simple t=
o break on junit faq and in Junit book.

do you have futher guidance? The q=
uestion which unit test to do is as important as the question how to do uni=
t test because if we don't do the good unit tests then the ROI will be low =
(or even negative) and the practice won't last long within the programmers =
teams.



yours sincerely
lo=EFc midy
